meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with bright yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The arnicas in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked some arnicas to put in a vase.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the arnicas.
meanings.sent4: The arnicas stood out like drops of sunlight in the field.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow arnicas added a cheerful touch to the landscape.

meanings.definition: A preparation made from the dried flower heads of the arnica plant, used in herbal medicine for its anti-inflammatory properties.
meanings.sent1: She applied arnicas to the bruise to help reduce the swelling.
meanings.sent2: The arnicas ointment had a soothing effect on the skin.
meanings.sent3: The arnicas potion smelled surprisingly pleasant.
meanings.sent4: After using the arnicas, the pain seemed to melt away.
meanings.sent5: The arnicas remedy worked wonders on the inflammation.
